enterNameAge: Please enter your name and age to begin.
welcomeDescription: Discover your gaming personality through the Bartle Test, a fun and insightful experience designed to help you understand your player type. Choose your preferred language to begin the journey.
resultsExplorerDescription: Based on your answers, you have been categorized as an 'Explorer'. You enjoy discovering new things and are always looking for the next big adventure. Below are your detailed results and characteristics:
